label: Label
addLineBreaks: Add line break after loaded POI elevation
onlyNearest: Use only the nearest POI found
helpText: This is a tool for creating toposcopes. You can find the project at GitHub.
• Add POI - clicking the map will add new point to that location
• Load POIs - clickig the map set the position around which sould be POIs from OpenStreetMap database downloaded
• Move - enables dragging the points in the map
• Delete - clicking the point will remove it
• Save image - offers to download toposcope image as SVG
• Inner circle radius - radius of the inner circle in the toposcope
• Max distance of loaded POIs - max distance of POIs to load from the clicked position in the "Load POIs" mode
• Label - point label; {d} in the text will be replaced by distance of the point from the observer in km
• Observer - specifies if the point is that from which the observation is done (where the toposcope is placed)
